article_title: Bitcoin Fund May Have Contributed to Currency’s Rally
article_text:
After months at $250, the price of the digital currency bitcoin took flight in early November, peaking above $450 before falling back to $360 more recently. There is some evidence that trading in a bitcoin-linked fund, Bitcoin Investment Trust (GBTC), may have played a role in the spike.

On Oct. 21, for the first time since the fund’s May launch on the over-the-counter marketplace OTCQX, the spread between the publicly traded shares...

twitter.description: Heavy trading in Bitcoin Investment Trust may have contributed to the bitcoin price spike in late October, early November.
twitter.title: Bitcoin Fund Linked to Currency’s Rally

image.alt: Bitcoin fund may have contributed to currency’s rally
